channel.title: 508 owner?
channel.description: i've got metalscape v6 source, but if i try to make myself owner (admin because no playr=3 in 508), safe it, it won't change, it goes back to the old owner. anyone know why? i decompiled it, then changed and saved. thanks. and, How can i compile in 508? the compiler crashes when compiling =] thanks all

item.title: 508 owner?
item.dc:creator: @gs_pk_pure gs pk pure
item.description:
@gs_pk_pure wrote:

The 508 compiler is called all.bat and change your playerrights to 2 for owner that should fix your problem

Read full topic
